data.title: Dreams of Dark and Light The Great Short Fiction of Tanith Lee by Lee, Tanith: Fine Hardcover (1986) 1st Edition
data.meta_description: ISBN: 9780870541537 - 1st Edition - Hardcover - Arkham House Pub - 1986 - Condition: Fine - Fine - 507 pages, with illustrations. Jacket protected in mylar. - Dreams of Dark and Light The Great Short Fiction of Tanith Lee
data.text:
Terms of Sale:

Please send your check or money order to the address listed below. Kentucky residents only, please add 6% sales tax. For single copies, add $3.75 shipping, if mailed in the U.S., + $1.00 for each additional book. For shipping outside the U.S., please contact me directly at mjohmann@msn.com. Check listings for additional mailing costs in the case of multi-volume works. All items shipped promptly upon confirmation of payment. If not satisfied, I will gladly refund the original sale price, provided...

More Information

Shipping Terms:

Shipping costs are based on books weighing 2.2 LB, or 1 KG. If your book order is heavy or oversized, we may contact you to let you know extra shipping is required.
